DOC.criteria: Ability understand purpose risk study provide sign date informed consent authorization use protect health information ( PHI ) accordance national local subject privacy regulation . Aged 18 55 year old , inclusive , time informed consent . Must good health , determine Investigator , base medical history screening evaluation . Must body mass index 18 34 kg/m2 , inclusive . Subjects childbearing potential must practice effective contraception study willing able continue contraception 30 day last dose study treatment . History clinically significant cardiac , endocrinologic , GI , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , renal , major disease , determine Investigator . History malignant disease , include solid tumor hematologic malignancy ( except basal cell squamous cell carcinoma skin completely excise consider cure ) . Serious infection ( e.g. , pneumonia , septicemia ) determine Investigator within 3 month prior Day 1 . Diarrhea , constipation , abdominal pain , flushing , nausea within 28 day prior Day 1 . History severe allergic anaphylactic reaction . Additionally , subject history intolerance ASA nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) must exclude .
